img.alt: Combs Performing Arts Center almost ready to open

div.div: There's no need to wait! We've set up a virtual enrollment portal to get you all set up for next year.

article.aria-label: Celebrate our CHS Class of 2020 at 20:20

h3.a: Celebrate our CHS Class of 2020 at 20:20

div.div: Every night until graduation, the Combs High School stadium lights will be lit in honor of our seniors from 8:00-8:20pm.

article.aria-label: Have Questions about our Coronavirus Response?

h3.a: Have Questions about our Coronavirus Response?

div.div: We have answers. Click above to view our Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) regarding our response to COVID-19.

article.aria-label: Free Breakfast and Lunch Meals Available

h3.a: Free Breakfast and Lunch Meals Available

div.div: Free breakfast and lunch is available to anyone ages 18 and under at Simonton Elementary.
Additional information and frequently asked questions regarding the District's response to COVID-19 found here.

article.aria-label: Combs Recognized as National Showcase District

h3.a: Combs Recognized as National Showcase District

div.div: On Monday, February 3, we will welcome hundreds of educators from across the nation into our classrooms.

article.aria-label: New Year, New Address: New Location for Combs District Office

h3.a: New Year, New Address: New Location for Combs District Office

div.div: As of December 23, 2019 the J.O. Combs Unified School District has a new district office location. Please note our new address!

article.aria-label: District Receives Grant Funding for Four School Safety Positions

h3.a: District Receives Grant Funding for Four School Safety Positions

div.div: The J.O. Combs Unified School District is a proud recipient of the State Board of Education School Safety Program Grant.

article.aria-label: Combs Celebrates March Students of the Month

h3.a: Combs Celebrates March Students of the Month

div.div: The Student of the Month program provides an opportunity each month for one student from each of the district's seven schools to be recognized.

article.aria-label: Combs High School Class of 2020 Graduation

h3.a: Combs High School Class of 2020 Graduation
